isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WHEELS, RIMS AND TIRES - SERVICE PROCEDURE - BRAKE SERVICE

svcproc.title: BRAKE SERVICE

step1.para: Vehicles with Hydraulic Disc Brakes will have to have the Wheel or Rim Tire Assembly removed to service the Wheel/ Brake Components.
Vehicles with cast spoke wheels or disc wheels and inboard mounted brake drums (single or dual tires): remove wheel, hub and drum as an assembly to perform brake service.

Vehicles with disc wheels (single or dual tires) with outboard mounted brake drums: remove wheel or dual wheels assembly. Then remove brake drum leaving hub assembly intact on vehicle. Wheel bearing and seal service will not be required with this procedure.

svcproc.para: For more detailed information on Brake Service, refer to GROUP 04 - BRAKES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
